title: Red envelopes use Snowdown Chest info
body: So the new red envelopes were basically reskins of the snowdown chest which we all knew, but this is just ridiculous. RiTo can't even bother to change the warning that's 4 days past being relevant.

replies.body:
Hi! 

Thanks for the report! I know the store team is aware of the issue. I'd be happy to follow up with them today. :)
Wanted to report the same bug.
